data.title: Claes Oldenburg & Coosje van Bruggen
meta_keywords: Claes Oldenburg & Coosje van Bruggen artist
Claes Oldenburg & Coosje van Bruggen Pace
Claes Oldenburg & Coosje van Bruggen Pace Gallery
data.meta_description: Claes Oldenburg is renowned for his sculptures, drawings, and colossal monuments that transform familiar objects into states that imply animation and sometimes revolt.
